title: Manual Control Function Block
description:
WEEKDAY_TO_STRING converts a weekday in the corresponding string.
The input WDAY indicates the corresponding day of the week: 1 = Monday
and 7 = Sunday. The input LANG chooses the language: 1 = English and 2
= German. LANG = 0 used as Default the language specifed in the Global
Setup variable LANGUAGE_DEFAULT. [fzy] The input LX sets the length of
the string to be generated: 0 = full month name, 3 = 3-letter abbreviation,
all other values at the input LX are undefned. 
The strings produced by the module, and the supported languages are deï¿¾fned in the Global Constants and can be expanded and changed. 
WEEKDAY_TO_STRING(1,0,0) = ' Monday ' 
dependent on the global constant LANGUAGE_DEFAULT
WEEKDAY_TO_STRING(1,2,0) = ' Monday ' 
WEEKDAY_TO_STRING(1,0,2) = ' Mon ' 
 14. Memory Modules
name: MANUAL_2

input.name: IN
input.description: Input signal to the function block indicating the manual input state.

input.name: ENA
input.description: Enable signal to activate the function block.

input.name: ON
input.description: Signal indicating a request to turn the output ON.

input.name: OFF
input.description: Signal indicating a request to turn the output OFF.

input.name: MAN
input.description: Manual control input signal when neither ON nor OFF is active.

output.name: Q
output.description: Current output state of the function block.

output.name: STATUS
output.description: Status code representing the current state of processing.
